title: Daily Presence Starter Pack
shortDescription: Gentle daily practices to begin and end your day with presence.
fullDescription: A curated set of rituals to help you greet the morning with gratitude and wind down your evening with calm reflection.
semanticSummary: Daily bookend rituals supporting mindfulness and emotional balance.

title: Connection & Appreciation Pack
shortDescription: Strengthen bonds through weekly connection and appreciation.
fullDescription: A relationship-focused collection to maintain emotional intimacy, share appreciations, and align for the week ahead.
semanticSummary: Partner-centered rituals fostering appreciation and meaningful check-ins.

title: Weekend Warmth Pack
shortDescription: Joyful and restorative rituals for the weekend.
fullDescription: A playful yet grounding weekend set to create memories and recharge together.
semanticSummary: Lighthearted connection with gentle restoration for weekends.
